text: Goodou gu hagabalumee Au i mua agu daangada bolo gii mee di kae godou mee ‘barley’ mo godou palaawaa. Goodou gu daaligi nia daangada ala hagalee belee hai gii mmade, gei e daahi nia mouli o digau ala hagalee belee hai gi mouli. Goodou guu hai di godou kai tilikai gi agu daangada, gei digaula gu hagadonu goodou.”
